
{{alias}}( obj, props )
    Defines properties.

    Parameters
    ----------
    obj: Object
        Object on which to define the properties.

    props: Object
        Object with property descriptors.

    Examples
    --------
    > var obj = {};
    > defineProperties( obj, {
    ...     'foo': {
    ...         'value': 'bar',
    ...         'writable': false,
    ...         'configurable': false,
    ...         'enumerable': true
    ...     },
    ...     'baz': {
    ...         'value': 13
    ...     }
    ... });
    > obj.foo = 'boop';
    > obj
    { 'foo': 'bar' }

    See Also
    --------
